replication_start_date.title: Replication Start Date
replication_start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: The refresh token used obtained via authorization (can be passed to the client instead)

lwa_app_id.title: LWA APP ID
lwa_app_id.description: Your login with amazon app id

lwa_client_secret.title: LWA Client Secret
lwa_client_secret.description: Your login with amazon client secret

role_arn.title: Role ARN
role_arn.description: The role’s arn (needs permission to “Assume Role” STS)

aws_env.title: Marketplace
aws_env.description: Affects the AWS base url to be used.

region.title: Region
region.description: The region from which you'd like to pull data.
